title: fc359340.WiSe2016SG740.001
frontText: In order to install WSUS, you would use what program?

title: fc359340.WiSe2016SG740.022
frontText: You need to install a way to automate the installation of Windows operating systems by using an image or through the network.

title: fc359340.WiSe2016SG740.023
frontText: You have a Windows Server 2016 Windows Image (WIM) that is mounted. You need to display information about the image.
backText: Run DISM and specify the /get‐ImageInfo parameter.

frontText: In a four‐node cluster set to a Node And File Share Majority quorum model, how many votes can be lost before quorum is lost?

frontText: This command allows an administrator to disconnect a virtual network adapter from a virtual switch.

frontText: This PowerShell command allows an administrator to view information about the host.
